alert.note: Alert for Adams; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ADAMS AND WESTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mechanicsburg, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... York, Weigelstown, Shiloh, West York, Grantley, Manchester, Emigsville, Dillsburg, Lake Meade, Spring Grove, Dover, North York, East Berlin, York Airport, Siddonsburg, New Salem, Franklintown, Wellsville, Ski Roundtop Ski Area and Messiah College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
